column1: #text=I was so scared to find out that I had to go on the airplane to visit my grandmother .
#text=She had been very sick and in the hospital for awhile now so I owed it to her .
#text=I would have taken the bus but it was at least a twenty four hour journey if driving .
#text=I searched some popular sites online and found the perfect flight deal .
#text=It was a round trip flight from New York to Orlando and it would only take four hours .
#text=I was scheduled to leave the following morning so I packed just enough stuff to fit on a carryon bag .
#text=The airline charged extra money based on how many bags you had .
#text=Carry ons were free and I was only staying for two days so things worked out great .
#text=I arrived and the busy airport an hour long , went through the security part which took the longest .
#text=I had just minutes before my flight would board and my nerves were getting the best of me .
#text=But once I got on things were great .
#text=I had a window seat but never looked out to see the clouds .
#text=The flight attendants were great and offered me drinks and snacks .
#text=My ears rang a little but the gum I chewed helped .
#text=There was n't any turbulence and I was by my grandmothers side before I knew it .
#text=So glad to have been able to overcome my fears .
